BannerTitle: At Woof Tulum we do much more than take care of pets.
BannerDescription: We care about your pet as much as we care about ours. So you can find in our team animal lovers with the experience to provide you with the quality service that your dog friends deserve.
AboutWoofParam1: Above all, we are true animal lovers.
AboutWoofParam2: And that is the main reason that has led us to found Woof Tulum, a dog grooming salon specialized in caring for and pampering pets following a model of aesthetics under stress.
AboutWoofSubParam1: Dog grooming is much more than the disposition or aesthetics of the animal.
AboutWoofSubParam2: At Woof Tulum, we help you maintain your pet's hygiene, monitor it's health, detect alterations in its skin, as well as any disease. We also perform these other tasks.
Service1: Comb and brush the dog's coat
Service4: Application of treatments to improve the coat
